errors.error_description: The installation command uses the incorrect package name 'section-properties' instead of 'sectionproperties'.
correction_candidates: Change `pip install section-properties` to `pip install sectionproperties`.
Change `pip install section-properties` to `pip install section.properties`.
Change `pip install section-properties` to `pip install section_properties`.
Change `pip install section-properties` to `pip install 'sectionproperties'`.
errors.golden_answer: Change `pip install section-properties` to `pip install sectionproperties`.

errors.error_description: The URL for the license file is incorrect, pointing to a non-existent 'LICENSE.md' file instead of 'LICENSE'.
correction_candidates: Change the license URL to `https://github.com/robbievanleeuwen/section-properties/blob/master/LICENSE`.
Change the license URL to `https://github.com/robbievanleeuwen/section-properties/blob/main/LICENSE`.
Change the license URL to `https://github.com/robbievanleeuwen/section-properties/LICENSE`.
Change the license URL to `https://github.com/robbievanleeuwen/section-properties/raw/master/LICENSE`.

errors.error_description: The README incorrectly states that the package only supports Python 3.7, which is an unnecessary and inaccurate version restriction.
correction_candidates: Remove the sentence: 'Note: `sectionproperties` only supports Python 3.7.'
Change the sentence to 'Note: `sectionproperties` supports Python 3.7 and newer.'
Change the sentence to 'Refer to the Python Version badge for compatibility details.'
Change the sentence to 'Note: `sectionproperties` is tested on Python 3.7+.'
errors.golden_answer: Remove the sentence: 'Note: `sectionproperties` only supports Python 3.7.'

errors.error_description: The installation instructions unnecessarily ask the user to install `numpy` and `scipy` manually, when they are dependencies that pip will handle automatically.
correction_candidates: Remove the `pip install numpy scipy` command.
Add a note explaining that `numpy` and `scipy` are installed automatically as dependencies.
Change the commands to `pip install sectionproperties[all]`.
Combine the commands into one line: `pip install numpy scipy sectionproperties`.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the `pip install numpy scipy` command.

errors.error_description: The command provided to install from the git repository is syntactically incorrect because it is missing the '.git' suffix on the URL.
correction_candidates: Change the command to `pip install git+https://github.com/robbievanleeuwen/section-properties.git`.
Change the installation method to `pip install sectionproperties`.
Change the command to `git clone https://github.com/robbievanleeuwen/section-properties.git && cd section-properties && pip install .`.
Change the command to `pip install https://github.com/robbievanleeuwen/section-properties/archive/master.zip`.

errors.error_description: The link in the 'Features' section is broken, pointing to a non-existent 'features.html' page within the documentation.
correction_candidates: Change the link to `https://sectionproperties.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user_guide.html`.
Change the link to point to the documentation homepage: `https://sectionproperties.readthedocs.io/`.
Remove the 'Features' section entirely as the information is in the docs.
Change the link to `https://github.com/robbievanleeuwen/section-properties#features`.
